full_summary:
# 6D063-225702 -Welding Services Tender

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference**: WS3972694170-Doc3972897116
* **Publication Date**: April 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 19, 2023 at 14:00:00 East Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Procurement Category**: Supply and Services (G)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Solicitation Type**: Standing Offer

## Description of Services

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking to establish a standing offer for welding services to support the maintenance and repair of its facilities in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The work includes the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, supervision and material necessary for various types of welding services.

## Quantities and Period of Services

* The Standing Offer is expected to be valid for a period of five (5) years, from June 1, 2023 to May 31, 2028.
* It is anticipated that one (1) firm will be issued a standing offer.

## Tender Requirements

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 19, 2023 at 14:00:00 EDT.
* All bids submitted after the designated time will be considered non-responsive.
* The tender must include all required information as stated in the tender package.

## Call Information

* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16068107?extsite=MTYwNjgxMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Notice ID**:     16068107
* **Contact Person**: Mike Fagan (SPAC/PSPC), mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note that I have corrected the contact information to reflect that the phone number, fax number and physical address were not shared by the contractor.
